name: 陳信安
objective:
本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.
schedule:
1. Crystal
2. Bravais lattice
3. Point group and space group
4. Diffraction
5. Geometry and intensity
6. Structure determination
7. Other related topic
materials:
(Optional)
Elements of X-ray Diffraction, B. D. Cullity and S. R. Stock
Essentials of Crystallography, Duncan McKie and Christine McKie
Crystallography - An Introduction, Walter Borchardt-Ott
